author: Al Jazeera
title: India: Virus spikes cybercrime, world's tallest statue 'on sale'
description: India's home ministry reports 86 percent rise in cybercrime in past four weeks as scammers try to sell Statue of Unity.
content:
Police in India have lodged a case against an unknown online fraudster who tried selling the world's largest statue for $4bn, claiming the proceeds would be used to help the Gujarat state government fund its fight against the novel coronavirus.
